mainSequence.step: Library Management Interface requests book details
Book Management System queries book details from Database
Database returns book details to Book Management System
Book Management System shows book details to Library Management Interface
Library Management Interface displays book details to Librarian
Librarian edits book and location information using Library Management Interface
Library Management Interface sends updated details to Book Management System
Book Management System updates book details and location in Database
Database confirms the success of the update to Book Management System
Book Management System confirms the success of the update to Library Management Interface
Library Management Interface displays update confirmation to Librarian
